Package io.micronaut.http.server.codec

Class TextStreamCodec

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.http.server.codec.TextStreamCodec
All Implemented Interfaces:
MediaTypeCodec
@Singleton @Internal @Requires(bean=ByteBufferFactory.class) @Deprecated(forRemoval=true, since="4.7") public class TextStreamCodec extends Object implements MediaTypeCodec
Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
Replaced with message body writers / readers API
A MediaTypeCodec that will encode Event objects in order to support Server Sent Events.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Graeme Rocher
